# init(content:)

**Initializer**

Creates a form with the provided content.

## Declaration

```swift
init(@ViewBuilder content: () -> Content)
```

## Parameters

- **content**: A [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ViewBuilder] that provides the content for the form.
title: init(content:)
